title: S rank chest through premade
body: I know you have to own the champion you're playing to get the chest drop, but do you have to own your premade teammate's champ to get their S rank chest? Riot boi pls respond, this will make or break my $5 bet

replies.body:
Ooooooo I do love a good bet. So, you **DO NOT** need to own your premades champion to get a chest from their S rank. **YOU** still have to own your champion though.

Heck, they don't even need to own the champ they played. If someone in your premade gets an S rank, you will get a chest as long as you have one available and own your champion.

Ayyyy but do I win too?

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
hol up, so you saying that if I dont own Vayne, but my teammate does and gets an S, then I will get a chest too?

You need to own your champion in order to get a chest.

> YOU still have to own your champion though.
yuuuuuup as long as the champ you are playing does NOT already have its chest unlocked that season!
Nope, you need to own the champion you're playing to get a chest.

I believe you misunderstood. If you don't own a champion, yet get an s+ on it. Your team can get a chest. You, however, will not. As I've had this happen before I can vouch for it. If you onw your champ, and someone who does NOT own theirs gets an s, you WILL get a chest.
